body_html:
Sure, I can quickly start a presubmit run for windows cmake gpu on any pull requests you need.

On Wed, Jan 25, 2017 at 2:24 PM, Geoffrey Irving ***@***.***> wrote: @gunan <https://github.com/gunan> Ah, the GPU Windows build probably will break. To fix it I need to add a flag to cmake's use of nvcc. Since I can't test it myself, should I prepare a PR and ask you to test? — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. body:
Sure, I can quickly start a presubmit run for windows cmake gpu on any pull
requests you need.

On Wed, Jan 25, 2017 at 2:24 PM, Geoffrey Irving <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> break. To fix it I need to add a flag to cmake's use of nvcc. Since I can't
> test it myself, should I prepare a PR and ask you to test?
